author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
Tom Hiddleston, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Karen Gillan, Mark Hamill, Benjamin Pajak, Matthew Lillard, Kate Siegel, Mia Sara, Annalise Basso, and director Mike Flanagan sit down with RT's Jacqueline Coley to talk about their upcoming movie 'Life of Chuck'. The cast shared their favorite Stephen King movie, their favorite on-set memory, and so much more. See 'Life of Chuck' in theaters June 6.

► Buy Tickets for Life of Chuck: https://www.fandango.com/the-life-of-chuck-2025-239816/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/the_life_of_chuck?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
 
Subscribe to the channel and click the bell icon to be notified of all the hottest trailers: http://bit.ly/2CNniBy  

► Shop Rotten Tomatoes: http://bit.ly/3KvCU1M
 
00:00 Tom Hiddleston and Mike Flanagan

41:01 Annalise Basso

title: The 'Life of Chuck' Cast Share Their Favorite Stephen King Movie

US Release Date: July 2, 2025
Starring: Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, Mahershala Ali
Director: Gareth Edwards
Synopsis: Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, the planet's ecology has proven largely inhospitable to dinosaurs. Those remaining exist in isolated equatorial environments with climates resembling the one in which they once thrived. The three most colossal creatures within that tropical biosphere hold the key to a drug that will bring miraculous life-saving benefits to humankind.

► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/jurassic_world_rebirth?cmp=Trail
title: Jurassic World Rebirth - Don't Move (2025)
